page.title: 13Living in a Hotel
page.content: Living in a hotel is o.k. sometimes but sometimes it's awful. The times that it is awful is when the telephone is always ringing with people who want rooms.The reception bell is always going so people are always rushing up and down stairs.Your mum is never around when you want her.You can never get into the kitchen because someone is cooking breakfast or dinner.If there aren't enough rooms for the staff downstairs,you have to have your bedrooms at the top of the hotel. One of the good things about living in a hotel is that you get the meals that the guests have,because the chef cooks extra food.Another good thing is that sometimes your mum wants you to go away because you keep annoying her,so you can go to the pier with your friends. Kathryn Thompson
